data.title: Larry Ellison has abruptly shut down the foundation he spent years setting up
data.meta_description: The Oracle billionaire has made a drastic decision yet again so he can focus on combating Covid-19.
data.text:
The Oracle billionaire has made a drastic decision yet again so he can focus on combating Covid-19.
